name: Sophia Carter
review: Amazing experience! The counselor was incredibly supportive and provided actionable advice that truly helped me. Highly recommend!

name: James Harrison
review: Great service overall. The sessions were well-structured and personalized to my needs. Only a bit of delay in scheduling.

name: Emily Brooks
review: Very insightful! I feel more confident about my career direction. The tips on interview prep were especially helpful.

name: Michael Taylor
review: The service was good, but I wish there were more time for Q&A during the session. Otherwise, very professional!

name: Olivia Martin
review: Absolutely loved it! The counselor went above and beyond to address my concerns. Will definitely book again.

name: Daniel Foster
review: The session was engaging and informative. The strategies provided for job searching are already showing results!
